meanings.sent1: The cookies were underbaked and gooey in the middle.
meanings.sent2: The underbaked bread was doughy and pale.
meanings.sent3: The underbaked cake looked like a sad, sunken sponge.
meanings.sent4: Her underbaked pie crust was as soft as a cloud.
meanings.sent5: The underbaked muffins were a disappointment, lacking the golden crust.

meanings.sent1: The underbaked chicken was pink inside and unsafe to eat.
meanings.sent2: The underbaked pasta was hard and crunchy.
meanings.sent3: The underbaked steak mooed when you cut into it!
meanings.sent4: His underbaked omelette was a runny mess.
meanings.sent5: The underbaked vegetables were as raw as if they were just picked.
